resources.string: Want to join in this event?
All contacts in current work group.

\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020 Minxing is developed by Dehui Network Co., Ltd. It is a enterprise communication and sharing platform, a collaborative work platform based on SNS. It helps enterprises to realize an efficient communication and coordination across regions, departments, tasks and business applications.
